title: Need help pairing a font...
content:
Hey,

Racking my brains on this one... any suggestions welcome!

Logo approved (set in Bebas and Heroic Condensed) and Headings approved (set in Heroic Condensed light and bold), but what body copy to use?! Everything i've tried so far jar's with the very high x-height and condensed nature of the headings. Thoughts?

Thanks,  
BPK

comments.content:
Hi - Any thoughts on this one? Two potential options attached, Trade Gothic and Officina... either working in peoples opinion?
